org.linter
Class AlgorithmicImageSelector

java.lang.Object
  org.linter.AlgorithmicImageSelector

public class AlgorithmicImageSelector
extends java.lang.Object

Determine the best preview image, algorithm scans HTML and picks the most likely preview image from a variety of factors, including size, format, name, and repetition
